abstract: NASA scientists report that Curiosity rover has encountered changing composition of rocks over its three-year journey on Mars; most rocks examined by rover have been generally basaltic, but as it moves up three-mile-high Mount Sharp, Curiosity is finding rocks with entirely different composition, giving scientists sense of geological history of planet.
lead_paragraph: The changes found by Curiosity, the NASA vehicle on the planet, show how the climate and environment changed there more than 3 billion years ago.

headline.main: Mars Rover Finds Changing Rocks, Surprising Scientists
headline.print_headline: Mars Rover Discovers Rocks Full of Clues

snippet: The changes found by Curiosity, the NASA vehicle on the planet, show how the climate and environment changed there more than 3 billion years ago.
